description: All you need is 20 minutes to create a homemade pizza topped with Geoff Jansz' creamy Aussie feta
keywords: Pizza,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Fetta & Spinach Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Picasso Kitchen fresh dough ball (one packet)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 250°C/230°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Prepare dough according to packet instructions.

Meanwhile, heat 2 tbs oil from fetta tub in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add spinach and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until wilted. Transfer to a bowl and set aside to cool, then squeeze excess liquid from spinach.

Place dough bases on trays. Top with spinach, crumble over fetta and spoon over a little more oil from fetta tub. Scatter over chilli, if using, then bake for 12 minutes or until bases are golden and crisp. Serve.
